genes.title: æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹æ€§
genes.content:
- ğŸ› ï¸ Convert MCP tools into [LangChain tools](https://python.langchain.com/docs/concepts/tools/) that can be used with [LangGraph](https://github.com/langchain-ai/langgraph) agents
- ğŸ“¦ A client implementation that allows you to connect to multiple MCP servers and load tools from them

genes.title: examples æ¨¡å—è¯´æ˜
genes.content:
from mcp import ClientSession
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client

from langchain.agents import create_agent
from langchain_mcp_adapters.tools import load_mcp_tools

async with streamablehttp_client("http://localhost:3000/mcp") as (read, write, _):
    async with ClientSession(read, write) as session:
        # Initialize the connection
        await session.initialize()

        # Get tools
        tools = await load_mcp_tools(session)
        agent = create_agent("open
